room_title: Escape room "Inheritance" by Sixth Sense Escape Games in Oklahoma City
review: This is the best escape room we’ve done in the area. Owner was extremely friendly and the room (Inheritance) was challenging and fun! We’ve done two rooms here, and we’ll be back!

room_title: Escape room "Inheritance" by Sixth Sense Escape Games in Oklahoma City
review: Came here for my birthday. We did the hardest room, Inheritance. Although the room was challenging, my group still had a lot of fun. We are planning on returning to do another room soon.This is my third escape room to do in OKC. Overall, excellent customer service and the room is well done. Would definitely recommend trying Escape Games OKC to others.
